title: Karate kennen ult bug
body: Is it juste me or we cant see the ult on karate kennen? me and my 3 friend couldnt see it

replies.body:
Hey MWR Warrior - 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are investigating.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=HJLduXJd,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-03-11T18:21:07.647+0000)
>
> Hey MWR Warrior - 
> 
> Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are investigating.

This is still happening. its not frequent and i cant seem to find what causes it. I was facing a Vlad today and my ult would never appear. would do damage but was invis.
